MAC Address

Installation

  1. Print macchanger version or install it:

    # macchanger -V || pacman -S --needed macchanger

Usage

Find

  1. Find hardware vendor of MAC address:
    • Locally:

      $ macchanger -l | grep -i '<XX:XX:XX>'

    • Via web:
      • https://macvendors.com.

Set

  1. Set MAC address:
    1. Any random vendor:

      # ip l set <INTERFACE> down
# macchanger -A <INTERFACE>
# ip l set <INTERFACE> up

    2. Custom:

      # ip l set <INTERFACE> down
# macchanger -m <XX:XX:XX:XX:XX:XX> <INTERFACE>
# ip l set <INTERFACE> up

    3. Permanent (original):

      # ip l set <INTERFACE> down
# macchanger -p <INTERFACE>
# ip l set <INTERFACE> up
